hero.hero_paragraph: We are a dynamic firm focused on providing tailored solutions for every need of your business, connecting you with dynamic, energetic and extremely talented developers.

benefits.benefits_paragraph: Our team is made up of people who love what they do and know no limits. We evaluate your product needs to provide you agile solutions.

members.members_paragraph: Our co-founders have 15 years of combined experience in the big-data and development industry. We connect the best developers with the best companies, following a precise selection process.

members_cards.member_card_description_1: I am a woman with a passion for learning. I learn so that I can teach and motivate others. Having been a teacher, this comes naturally to me.  I came to Pidgin looking to spread that passion to others.
members_cards.member_card_description_2: I believe that relationships in a company should always be reciprocal. When you work hard for your team, wonderful things are achieved.

members_cards.member_card_description_1: I consider myself a leader who goes hand in hand with the goals and ideals of Pidgin. I have knowledge in personnel management and in the development of processes for the improvement of activities in the required areas.
members_cards.member_card_description_2: I advocate working like clockwork in the delivery and provision of services to our Pigeons.

members_cards.member_card_description_1: I characterize myself as a born leader, because I always seek to develop the potential of the people I work with in order to achieve goals.
members_cards.member_card_description_2: I enjoy working with the Pigeons. I am part of the sales team; an amazing group of professionals and one of the most energetic and dynamic sales departments I have ever been a part of.

contact_section.contact_section_text_1: The developer you need may be in our nest.
